author: shuwaku
title: Exhibit Largest BlockChainEXPO(JP)
description: Only few JP and East Asia companies recognize Cardano as main BLOCKCHAIN! so, it is difficult to adopt CARDANO into the real business world.
solution: We will exhibit at the B.C. EXPO, largest business events in JP, and introduce Cardano to Japanese Fortune 500 and public organizations.
experience: Cardano Youtuber / SPO / DC Spark member / Official Ambassador / Lawyer / Certified Accountant / Atara Prism Pioneers Program member
